name: Wintercoffin
description:
'A blood frozen death draws near'.

You are a hunter trapped in a blizzard. Will you make it back to your camp before you freeze to death???

Featuring our own music 'A dark wood of sorrow'.  Plus many different ambient sounds. 

Immerse yourself in this unique retro survival game. A vast and bleak open world awaits!!

32mb vram minimum windows 2000 and up

OSX 10.3.9 universal binary 

32 bit PPC/Intel CATALINA and higher not supported!!!

There is a minor glitch with some tree rendering at distance that I will fix at a later date. Doesn't affect gameplay!

If you like this game check out our many other games. There is quite a few now (including soundtracks) and if you donate to our cause we will be most grateful!
